main.name: Fezile Manana
main.occupation: Computer Science Student and Algorithm Development Intern
main.description: Areas of interest/experience include Machine Learning, Game Development and Cyber Security
main.bio: Originally from Eswatini, I am currently pursuing my bachelor's degree in computer science at Jacobs University Bremen. My interests outside of computer science include music and art. I have been a member of and lead several rock bands throughout my educational career.
main.contactmessage: Send a direct message to me in the form below.

resume.skillmessage: Technical skills (Warning: list may be subject to growth)

education.description: During my time at Jacobs I have gained skills and knowledge that have proven to be invaluable in my professional work experience. Relevant courses include: Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Secure and Dependable Systems, Software Engineering and Operating Systems.
The IB Diploma Programme is an internationally recognised pre-university course that cohere to the highest and most rigorous educational standards.

work.title: Algorithm Development Intern
work.description: Researched and implemented algirithms to reduce the memory footprint and improve efficiency of gas sensors. Prototyped a proof of concept for a firmware update specification of a new sensor signal conditioner.

projects.title: NO MAD
projects.category: Flight recommendations for students based on university holidays.

projects.title: CampusChat
projects.category: A web app for students to chat with professors and teaching assistants

testimonials.text: Mr. Manana has very good theoretical knowledge and a very quick grasp. This enables him to familiarise himself with new subject areas within a short time. [Translated from German]
